title: Flask of Cursed Flames
summaries: The Flask of Cursed Flames is a Hardmode flask that, when applied, causes melee weapons (and Whips) to inflict the Cursed Inferno debuff for 3–6 seconds on a successful hit. Melee weapons that fire projectiles will also inflict the debuff on enemies hit by the projectiles.
The Flask of Cursed Flames cannot be used in conjunction with other flasks, and using it will remove any existing flask effects. However, like other flasks, the effect will last across death.
The Flask of Cursed Flames will not inflict the Cursed Flames debuff in <linked>PvP</linked> scenarios.

statistics.Tooltip: Melee and Whip attacks inflict enemies with cursed flames
